side-image-size.name: Side Image Size
side-image-size.description: Does your image not fit? Change the sizing here. Recommended sizes: "contain", "cover", or any pixel (px) sizes below 300x480 ex. "300px 480px" or "300px auto".

hd-images.name: High-resolution Pop-up Images
hd-images.description: If you want higher resolution images, this will enable them. [b]Will increase page load times[/b].

username.name: Your MyAnimeList Username
username.description: Must be entered exactly as it appears on MyAnimeList. This is not required, but will reduce the impact on page load times.
